name: 3D Smash Badminton Pro Challenge - 2016
description:
3D smash badminton pro challange 2016

Experience the fastest racket sport in the world at your fingertips with hyper-realistic physics, HD quality graphics, slick UI and real sound effects that will make you come back for more. So, grab your badminton racket, take a swing and hit that Smash!
Play this fun badminton game using finger swipe and a smash button to put extra speed at your bird. Select three different levels to play.
